overview.description: AI-powered credit report analysis platform with OCR-based tradeline extraction, dispute letter generation, and comprehensive credit score tracking. Created by a former credit repair specialist to automate FCRA-compliant credit dispute workflows.

key_components.name: App.tsx
key_components.description: Frontend entry point handling client-side routing, global providers (Auth, Query), and layout structure

key_components.name: FastAPI Backend
key_components.description: Backend entry point configuring middleware, CORS, routers, and server settings for credit report processing

key_components.name: Multi-Level Cache
key_components.description: Hybrid caching mechanism combining Redis (distributed) and In-Memory (local) storage with fallback logic for tradeline data

key_components.name: Tradeline Extraction Pipeline
key_components.description: Core OCR and AI-powered tradeline parsing pipeline using Google Document AI and LLM-based extraction

key_components.name: Auth Provider
key_components.description: Context provider managing user authentication state and session persistence with Supabase

key_components.name: Credit Dashboard
key_components.description: Main dashboard component displaying credit score, tradelines, and dispute tracking interface

key_components.name: PDF Processor
key_components.description: Enhanced PDF processing service integrating OCR, text extraction, and AI-based tradeline parsing

key_components.name: Dispute Generator
key_components.description: Wizard-based UI for generating FCRA-compliant dispute letters with AI-powered content generation

key_components.name: Supabase Integration
key_components.description: Supabase client configuration and database access layer for PostgreSQL and authentication

key_components.name: Tradeline Normalizer
key_components.description: Data normalization and validation utilities for extracted tradeline information
